original_title: A Dream Called Walt Disney World
overview: The perfect way to reminisce about your Walt Disney World vacation! It's all here, exquisitely photographed and fully narrated. From Liberty Square to Fantasyland, the file covers every part of the Magic Kingdom. There's much more, though... an entire resort playground with all the luxurious resort hotels and rustic campgrounds that make up the Vacation Kingdom. Here's a beautiful souvenir of the single most popular vacation destination in the world!
tagline: A travelogue of the Walt Disney World theme park near Orlando, Florida.
title: A Dream Called Walt Disney World
